CreateChatDescription: Go to the AI-Chat tab to get started.
EmptyKnowledgeDescription: Files uploaded here will be indexed and used as context in the AI-Chat tab. Add files to ask AI questions, generate content, or collaborate on information.
EmptyKnowledgeDescriptionActions: Try these actions to get started:
EmptyResultsDescription: Files generated in AI-Chat will appear here automatically. Whenever you generate content, start a chat, or send a message with output, the result will be saved in this section.
EmptyResultsViewerDescription: You’ll see the results of AI chat activity from other users here once they become available.
InstructionsDescriptionAgent: Describe how the AI agent should behave and respond. Define its role, tone, and main tasks.
InstructionsDescriptionAgentExample: Example: “You are an AI PR assistant that helps write and edit press releases. Maintain a professional, confident, and media-friendly tone. Highlight key messages clearly, avoid jargon, and keep the text concise and engaging.”
KnowledgeDescription: Upload files from your computer or {{productName}} to provide better context for the chat. Note: some or all of the uploaded content may be exposed during the conversation.
KnowledgeUnavailableDescription: The Knowledge base is currently disabled. To activate semantic search and document processing for your AI agents, please configure the embeddings provider in the {{productName}} settings.
KnowledgeUnavailableDescriptionUser: The Knowledge base is currently disabled. To activate semantic search and document processing for AI agents, please contact your {{productName}} admin to configure the embeddings provider.
MCPDescriptionServers: Use MCP servers connected by the administrator to enhance chat experience with AI. MCP servers can assist with data extraction, summaries, smart suggestions, etc.
ModelDescription: Select the {{aiProvider}} and model to be used in this room’s chats. This setting is mandatory and applies to all participants.
ResponseQualityNode: <1>Note:</1> Response quality may vary by model; newer models are recommended for best results.
UploadFilesDevice: Upload files from your personal device
AgentInViewModeWarning: You’re in view-only mode for this AI agent. You can see the results of AI chat activity from other users.
